active_incidents.title: Some users unable to post reminders with custom emoji

notes.body: We’re still actively investigating this issue, but we don’t have any new information to share at this time. Thanks for sticking with us as we continue to work towards a fix.

Some users may be experiencing issues with posting reminders when custom emoji is included in the text. We’re investigating, and will let you know as soon as we have an update to share. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
